import './checkout-item.style.css' import React from 'react' import { selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector' import { connect, Connect } from 'react-redux' import CheckoutCart from '../checkout-cart/checkout-cart.component' import { removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.action' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem: {name, imageUrl, price, quantity}}) => { return (
{name} {quantity} {price}
✕
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cartItems: selectCartItems(state) }) const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ removeItem: (item)=> removeItem(item) }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(CheckoutItem)
